sentence: I doubt the hotel has any preventative maintenance cleaning the ducts or replacing air filters at regular intervals
Does not appear rooms have been updated in a very long time and do not have some of the simple amenities that cheaper hotels now have
Rooms are dated but are slated to be remodeled
hotel appeared to be dated and could use a refresh in the rooms
Too many renovations and not as well suited locality wise compared to other downtown hotels
After a 2nd round of haggling and fussing after having run a 12 marathon the management finally offered a renovated room that allegedly had heat and a room discount
Hotel is quite run down they are refurbishing rooms so there is no heating system at the hotel presently and there will not be until they complete renovations which are long overdue
The man who checked us in took the time to talk with us when we asked about the remodeling they were doing

I am very disappointed with this hotelNo real updates in rooms lobby bar etcI would not say the room was dirty but the furniture was so old it felt that wayTerible location not in the main part of Downtown Miami
A little dated for a Hilton but they did advise that they were in the process of undergoing renovations
It is undergoing renovations and I stayed on one of the newly renovated floors
It is definitely showing its age but luckily they have started renovations
but I will start by saying that the hotel was undergoing construction and remodeling when we stayed but it did not bother us in any way
We stayed here in May 2016 and the hotel was undergoing renovation but the hotel staff made sure that if any issues encountered we do let them know
Hopefully once renovated the hotel will have new beds and better pillows
I would wait until the hotel renovations are completed to stay here
I was upgraded but not as nice room hotel is under construction and alot of stuff needs updating
Hotel was beautiful but my stay there was ruined due to the pool being closed for maintenance
We had asked specifically for a renovated room and received it
the renovation We stayed for a week
Great service room was pretty nice and clean the hotel as a whole needs an update some areas were rundown and out of date especially for being in Downtown Miami but good for the value
Great views needs better bathroom renovations very close to the beach
The rooms are updated standard size
The rooms itself was not bad it was very spacious clean and updated
Room seemed newly refurbished and was extremely clean welcoming
The hotel apparently had been renovated but it appeared to be very cheaply done and rushed
Hotel in need of updates
They did try their best to make up for the inconveniences I experienced but the hotel it ’s in desperate need of a renovation and better cleaning
It looks remodeled but they need to update the rooms again
I called the hotel to let them know and asked them to make sure to update her check in so her hotel reservation
